attributes.action: Stop all MPs & MLAs salaries in northern Ireland until the assembly stands again
attributes.background: The mps at stormount haven't met in over a year essentially  northern Ireland has no government, Westminster should stop there salaries immediately until a functioning government is restored.

rejection.details:
The salaries of MLAs are the responsibility of the Northern Ireland Assembly, not the UK Government or Parliament. Salaries are determined by the Independent Financial Review Panel. You can find out more about the IFRP here:

http://ifrp.org.uk/
